channel.title: [718/742] Zodiac || PvM/Eco Server || 24/7 Online ||
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/q7IUmBq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/U4ezXI6.png[/img] [url=http://www63.zippyshare.com/v/10860125/file.html]Jar Download[/url] Webclient: Coming soon Site: Coming soon [spoil]Almost perfect Farming! [img]http://i.imgur.com/LacTctH.gif[/img] Many new Slayer Tasks! [img]http://i.imgur.com/gWTquc9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iNGsm0Y.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/eICeozP.png[/img] New Mining/Woodcutting emotions! http://i.imgur.com/7bFDRiA.gif [img]http://i.imgur.com/BEyx9q4.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xJPi5gq.png[/img] Repair Stand! [img]http://i.imgur.com/SkhBrTQ.png[/img] Most of the new Emotes! [img]http://i.imgur.com/KP1IgAd.gif[/img]
[/spoil] [size=18]Features[/size] 24/7 Hosted Almost all skills are prefect! Loyalty System. Custom Titles to choose from. Fully working bosses. Working Fight Caves/Kiln. Custom Completionist Cape requirements. Many new Slayer tasks. Many of the new emotes added. Economy based server. Trying to update Daily.
[size=14pt]Client: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/slhwjqeo2aeuuiv/Zodiac%20742.jar]Zodiac 742 Cleint[/url] Webclient: Being worked on. Site: Being worked on.
Status: Online.[/size]
As i would like to mention from the start, the server is not perfect yet there are still bugs/glitches i need to work out.[/center]
